reviews_data.review_text:
I went to Stable hand for a quiet place to work and sip on some coffee. I loved the atmosphere, there was plenty of seating, outlets, and space to work comfortably. (They also have outdoor seating)
I was a huge fan of the coffee they serve, HEX coffee roasters, a local charlotte company.

Bonus, they serve wine here so this would be a cute spot to grab a glass after work with friends, maybe a snack and relax!
The Matcha latte is great!

My family and I stopped in at 6 pm today and Emily was ABSOLUTELY AMAZING! She was incredibly knowledgeable about their menu, took great pride in her offerings and was BEYOND kind!

I'm a coffee snob and I only like espresso either hot or iced and/or cold brew. I don't like Americanos, lattes, etc HOWEVER on our way to the shop I had read reviews about the rosemary latte and I LOVE rosemary so I was curious especially when I saw it on the menu. Emily was so enthusiastic about the latte that I went WAY out of my comfort zone to try one and WOWOWOW!!! I asked her how she liked it and she said iced and also advised that she puts the smoked salt on top so I took her suggestion except I opted for oat milk. The latte was PHENOMENAL!

Our whole experience was great and we definitely can't wait to come back! Despite us coming within an hour of closing time she didn't mind using her ceramic and glass for our drinks (my husband had a cappuccino that he said was very comparable to his favorite cappuccino ever) which may seem like not a big deal to most but sadly most places we go to either only have paper/plastic cups or if they do have ceramic they tell us WITH NO SHAME that it's almost closing time in a way that we're inconveniencing them by making them wash an extra dish...so annoying 

We will definitely be back very soon!!!
Great wine selections also
Fun spot for a casual brunch or coffee date

The food was tasty. Could use a little more seasoning for my personal preference, but I still really liked it. Coffee was tasty and the vibes were great. Staff was nice and informative. I'm excited to come back and sip some wine on the little patio area.
Nice place. Friendly service. Delicious drinks.
Highly recommend their tea and some of their beer options. Friendly staff and great vibe

Stable Hand is my go-to coffee shop in Charlotte. I like it even better than Not Just Coffee. The seasonal lattes they create are so good. Customer service is easy-going and really friendly. Parking is easy. Highly recommend this place!
Great vibes and coffee. Service was amazing.
Great vibes and food. Always a stop when walking the Rail trail!

I haven't been here in awhile due to most times when I walk in I am greeted with a  nonchalant how can we help you. Yesterday (11/29/24) I walked in and Gracie greeted me with a smile and inner joy that truly said she was happy to be there working and ready to help her customers. Good Coffee, Please get Coconut milk for those that really can't have the other kinds of milk. Also Almond milk takes away the flavor of coffee for those of you who truly love the coffee taste. Give Gracie a raise. She was awesome!!! I do hope I remembered her name correctly

This is a great spot to work for a while and enjoy a snack. I ordered the sweet pretzel bites and an iced vanilla matcha latte. The food was good--nothing exceptional, but enjoyable--and the service was solid as well. The space offers plenty of outlets for charging devices, and parking is available on the side or behind the coffee shop. I'll definitely return, but since they stop serving food at 3 p.m., I'll make sure to arrive earlier next time to try more of their offerings.
Service was terrible and the coffee was worst, if i wanted expensive watered down coffee i would have went to the gas station
Loved this place. Cute place to study or hang out and food was great! And more than I expected!
One of my go to coffee shops! Their cold brew is one of the best in town!
My favorite coffee shop in Charlotte.

I ordered the Avo Tartin(added egg), BLT sandwich( added Sausage Patty), Iced Brown Sugar Rosemary Latte(with almond milk), and Matcha Latte.
The BLT was a little bit smaller than I expected, but my kid loved it. And the Avocado Tartine had a spicy kick to it. I loved it!! The Sausage Patty was also good. We really enjoyed the food :)
But I wish the matcha flavor was a bit noticeable. The matcha flavor was overpowered by the milk.

The seasanal flavor profiles they concocted are awesome. Just recommend using a higher quality coffee as it did not have a full bodied flavor to back the autumn flavorings.

Staff nice, service quick. Recommend the seasonal gourd latte its really good.

The best coffee not only in Charlotte, but in the US. Their name speaks for itself - consistently good coffee every time I went there (and believe me, I lived nearby for 1.5 years and went there at least twice a week lol). The food is amazing! They also have a pretty extensive wine selection.
I haven't even been here in a couple months but I was just thinking about their porridge bowl with the eggs, kale, truffle, mushroom, SO SAVORY. Lattes hand crafted not overly sweet but tasty!
Everything is good here. Love the location, parking, menu and service. Highly recommend the avo tartine with a soft egg.
A fellow mountaineer owns this place and the coffee is outstanding! Whenever I'm close by, I stop in!
The cortado is super good. So was the overnight oats bowl  the staff is helpful and very nice.
Cute little spot and everyone was very friendly!

Wow!! This place really has earned its stars! The food is delicious (I got the chocolate chip banana bread ), the drinks are delightful (I got the blueberry lavender latte and also tried some amazing drink with matcha, coconut milk, pineapple juice, lime, and allspice ), and the customer service was beyond excellent! The atmosphere was also simply perfect. The live plants inside, colorful yet chic and sophisticated, and the sort of indie alternative coffee shop music was on point. I fully recommend checking out this local coffee shop!!
We like this chic and modern coffee shop. Their potatoes and flavored coffee are excellent.
Great atmosphere. I had a draft flat latte for the first time and it was great. My son had the brown sugar rosemary latte and he said it was great!

A delightful coffee shop, decorated in a rather spartan manner. On a Friday morning, quite peaceful as I enjoyed my second coffee of the day.

I love coffee shops that have a cortado on the menu. It tells me that they're not one of those button pushing baristas like at the Green Siren people. No, this is real coffee and real art. Served in the proper short glass, this coffee was excellent.

Sitting with my laptop and able to pound out a few emails and maybe even a Yelp review, this was a great little space for working. A very enjoyable morning indeed.
My go to coffee shop in Charlotte, highly recommended...

I was craving a good cup of coffee and this hit the spot. Our hot and iced coffees were both delish! We also got breakfast sandwiches. The portions were small, but it was exactly what we were looking for. It was also the perfect place to bring your laptop and work. We will be back!
Everything about this place, I absolutely love!
Delicious matcha, no sugar needed. Great place to get some work done (but bring headphones)
Great coffee drinks (including a draft latte for those in a hurry), interesting food menu, friendly and helpful staff, clean restrooms, indoor or outdoor seating....what's not to like?
Very good coffee,  good locacion and excellent service.

This was such a great experience! When you walk in, the space is so open, and they have lots of seating inside and out. I luckily went on a day it was warmer, so I already knew I wanted to sit outside.

I order the Cheesy-Toastie, Crispy Potatoes, and House Spritz. The spritz was so refreshing and smooth! I loved every second of it and recommended it to the woman next to me. My cheesy toastie was perfectly toasted, and this cheese perfectly melted. Every bite melted in my mouth. The crispy potatoes and the aioli were the perfect pairing for the day. Can't wait to bring my friends back!
Great staff, ambiance, and delicious coffee
Genuinely my favorite coffee I've ever had. Everything else tastes nasty in comparison.
Foods great and so are the people!
Sausage brekky Sando was delicious! Nice atmosphere, very clean and friendly. Latte art was beautiful

Coffee--great. Food--ordered the loaded potatoes, which was an up charge, only to have 2/3 of the extra ingredients missing. Informed the staff that ingredients were missing and was told they were out. Wish I knew this before paying.
One of my favorite places to cowork! There's usually plenty of seating, and there's food, coffee, and wine to keep me going
Great place to hand out with friends and enjoy good specialty coffee. Barista were tired and it effected the quality of the service.
A busy but cute cafe in CLT southend! Nice ambience and good food (although portion sizes could be bigger)

Nice little modern coffee shop with a variety of food, baked goods, and coffee. I ordered the brown sugar rosemary latte which was so smooth and comforting. I also got an avocado toast and a blueberry muffin. The avocado toast was a work of art and the egg was poached perfectly. Everything was balanced well and there was a nice little kick from the hot sauce that was drizzled on top. The blueberry muffin was moist, and they had other baked goods that looked amazing too. There was a consistent stream of customers cycling through so it definitely seems like a recognized spot in the neighborhood.
Great atmosphere and friendly staff. I got their Brown Sugar Rosemary Latte (Iced) and it's one of the best lattes I've ever had. A must-go if you're in the area for sure
One of the best coffee shops in charlotte!
Really cute place and sweet staff. The Oatmilk latte was delicious
Omg love the Mexican Mocha. If you're looking for an alternative coffee and libations stop. This is it!
Lovely vibe very comfortable and peaceful and welcoming

It's a medium size lovely cafe, they have some pretty creative options and it's a wonderful place to work if you can do it remotely. We had the spinach and herbs sando, the chorizo biscuit, the Blt, the cheesy toastey and a seasonal rosemary coffee and everything was delicious. Definitely would be back
Great coffee shop...I loved their latte and the breakfast dish with tofu.

The coffee was amazing.
The only reason why I gave a bad review is the lighting in the place, this bright white headlights are not comfortable at all, especially when someone is studying or working there. I left immediately cause I was getting a headache, felt like I was in a hospital lol
Cute coffee shop with friendly employees and they have the BEST potato wedges I have ever eaten in my life. The sauce on the potatoes is so amazing and my cappuccino is delicious as well.

Super chill spot. Folks working or looking productive, staff ready to serve, place smells good. I didn't put any thought into what I ordered. I just looked and spoke. Brown sugar rosemary latte and Strawberry Basil Biscuit...my goodness. I sat in the parking lot to have a taste because I couldn't wait. Let's just say I was tempted to go back in and get more but then couldn't decide if I should get so lucky with another random combo or get the same thing. Gluttony. I'll be back.

The perfect coffee shop for people who want to get some work done. There are tons of outlets!! And single 2 person tables. The place was very airy and open. Chill music in the background. Sadly, they were out of baked goods when I arrived at 1 pm :( but my LATTE!!! I got a brown sugar and rosemary latte, it was the seasonal, thinking i would be adventurous, and it was incredible. There was even a hint of salt on top. Fantastic froth despite being an oat milk latte. Will be returning next time I'm in Charlotte!

Some of the best coffee, most friendly and knowledgeable baristas, awesome baked goods, and the best PBJ in Charlotte  There are a variety of roasts available to fit your tastes, and even a few mixed drinks. There's also a natural wine selection, beer on draft, and mimosas.

I come here everyday, atleast 4 months now and my coffee is exactly the same every time (I'm so picky). I've never seen a coffee place be so consistent. Everyone is so sweet, I love it here! Best coffee in charlotte
Absolutely delicious and beautiful lattes, great food options and friendly staff. I was very pleased with my visit to Stable Hand!
Love this place. Great place to work. Delicious bites and lattes !

I feel like this was great coffee for a reasonable price. They have a few coffees on draft that you're able to get, and I'd recommend getting the vanilla latte. The people I was with also had the loaded potato wedges and they felt it was 5/5. If you're in the area this is a great place to sit and have coffee for a while, and they also sell wine towards the end of the day.
Love this place, one of the best coffee places in Charlotte.

This was delicious. I loved the PBJ probably because I love brioche. There was a coupon issue but it was quickly resolved. They made a great suggestion and while the vanilla latte was supposed to be hot, the universe decided it should be cold. The universe was correct and I was wrong 
This interior is a little dark on an overcast day but I love that there are dogs on the patio outside.
The strawberry biscuit on the afternoon menu is amazing! It's like an elevated boberry biscuit.

Good quality food that's definitely worth its price. Very clean atmosphere with spacious parking lock behind the building. Friendly workers. It's a prefect place to catch up with a friend or put some headphones in and get some work done!
Fruit Loops / Honey Nut Cheerios Latte

Really nice specialty coffee and espresso shop.  One of the better lattes in Charlotte and as a bonus they feature gourmet breakfast sandwiches that are portioned perfectly for a light breakfast and delicious!
The Villena Lattea was amazing and the food items were from a different cafe.  The environment and staff were amazing as well.  Please check them out if you are in the area.
Stable Hand is awesome
Great location for a coffee shop, right off the light rail. This one is small and cozy, good spot to work out of, or just get a coffee and go for a walk in Southend
Love the savory porridge and iced latte! Great study spot and friendly staff!
Fantastic coffee shop with excellent seasonal drinks, delicious cold brew, and great food offerings. Outdoor and indoor seating are both great and the baristas are very friendly.
Beautiful place to chill-out with your group! We personally felt the coffees and lattes could be more flavorful

it's a decent spot. quiet except for some elevator music. not distracting though for getting things done. located in a small center with adequate free parking. close to apartments and walking path. the employees were kind and attentive. my vanilla latte with oat milk was really good. they have an interesting array of wines available for purchase. many I've never seen or heard of before. outdoor seating. i went on a Sunday afternoon by myself. i would go back. i recommend.
The mocha latte with almond milk was amazing! And Crispy potatoes are highly recommended with their amazing mustard
Pleasant experience. I saw their beans were from HEX coffee which I think is another coffee shop around here.
Da  no
It's coffee! Outdoor seating is great for people watching and pets.

Stable Hand has great coffee and consistently delivers delicious coffee drinks. Great casual ambience and easy parking. Have no tried their food offerings, but I will love them to have more pastries (croissants, cinnamon rolls, etc.). Highly recommended!

Rude rude rude. Unprofessional boy on Sunday soon after 2pm. Really, you are completely out of food for the day? Why not post that on social media if it's true. I think sassy boy was full of hot air. Plus it looked dumpy so thanks for the quick departure. Don't plan on ever returning.
Loved the shop, super clean and very modern! The baristas had great suggestions and super sweet personalities! Great place, definitely plan to go back!

Great food and great service, I recommend planning to get take out just in case due to the limited seating but it was well worth every penny. We got the tofu miso brekky sando, the chorizo biscuit, and the rosemary latte. The latte was so unique and delicious!
Coffee and appetizers are great. If you're getting a draft beer make sure to ask for a sample first because it's luke warm sometimes.
The porridge is awesome!!

Coffee was a little spicy for my crew (we all got something with a little spice in it, that's on us) however it was still delicious. I loved the thought that was put into the entire vibe at Stable Hand as well as the drinks.

I love, love this little place. My favorite dish is the savory rice porridge. It's a delicious and sophisticated little dish. We live in Southpark and don't mind taking a drive even on a work day to start the day right with this dish. My partner gets the sausage breakfast sandwich which he loves. Great flavors and nice vibes! Coffee is also well made. Need to stop by in the evening to try some of their natural wines. Great efforts and team!
Great coffee, food and service.  Hunter was the best!!

Relaxed, easygoing vibe with simple, vibrant decor and an outdoor patio. Stable Hand is such a great place to get some work done during the day, and a low-key spot for trying new beer and wine.

Obadiah, our barista, was incredibly friendly! They currently have a Seasonal menu which offered an super tasty Rosemary Latte along with other unique creations.

The Vanilla Latte was perfectly sweetened and just the right temperature.
We will be back!

When I arrived on a Thursday around 9:30am their bakery delivery had not yet arrived so I wasn't able to try those. The cappuccino was good but nothing overly spectacular. The lack of food choices was disappointing considering it was already mid morning.

Today I stepped in to Stable Hand and am so happy that I did. This may be one of my new favorite coffee shops. Honorable considering there is no shortage of coffee shops here in Charlotte. I had the pecan pie latte with almond milk instead of the standard whole milk and a side of the sourdough that comes salted and with butter. Absolutely amazing! I scarfed the majority of it down in the car lol! There is on site parking here for those who have parking anxiety like me! There is also free street parking nearby as well. If you're following gps, turn in when you see Penn Station. Stable Hand is in this plaza. They also have wine and beers (both canned and draft!) I didn't get the chance to try it out today but I will definitely be back another day! Thank you Stable Hand and thank you Offline for having this place as a one of the monthly rewards for November. Excellent choice!

Stable Hand has great coffee, and it's a great place to plug in some headphones and work on your laptop. The staff was friendly as well. I wasn't a huge fan of the food (modern twist on higher-end breakfast food?), but as I mentioned above the coffee was great. There is also a good amount of parking, and the patio is nice as long as it isn't too hot or cold outside!
Fabulous sausage breakfast sandwich and coffee.
always a good idea - tasty wine and great people!

Proper coffee drinks. Had a great cappuccino and the food was great too. Great vibe as well.

This is a coffee/wine place with optional small food menu.
Tofu & Spinach? Yes please  great service with friendly staff. Service was fast and delicious. Great location!
I've tried this place 4x. So slow, always out of food, and staff is just rude. I really tried to enjoy this space because it is so close to home. Would rather go to any other coffee shop.
Their iced vanilla latte is the best one in Charlotte! I also love some of their other drinks that are not coffee based.
Awesome espresso drinks and friendly barista. I'm just visiting Charlotte but if I lived here I would definitely hang out here. Chill environment and open until 7 which is great!

Small coffee shop with some tables to eat inside and outside. Good setup with a lot of power outlets for working on your laptop.
There were a lot of people working when I went during weekdays.
No too cozy, lore kind of the clean and minimalistic type.
The matcha was well prepared. Nice taste and texture. Not lumpy at all. I enjoyed it.
The service is good too.
The food was ok. Very cute presentation. I has the Avo Tart. It was too pricey, in my opinion. The avocado wasn't very flavorful. There was a bit too much of this hot oil on it. I added and egg. They call it soft egg and say the egg white is cooked, but it isn't. It was an almost completely raw egg, which some people may like, but I like the egg white better done.
They did change it and offered a scrambled egg instead, which was cooked in a funny way. Although it was a scrambled egg. This was $10.85.
I still enjoyed the drink very much. Thank you.
Great people, great place to work. Coffee is good and the food is delicious! Must have the porridge
Love the draft lattes!
Best coffee I've had in Charlotte
Come for the coffee, gourmet food, and high-quality natural wine selection. Stay for the community. Stable Hand 4E.
A great place to grab a coffee and get some work done, or to read a bit while you get ready to take on the day. Wonderful, caring staff, too.
Great vibes, indoor and outdoor seating. A lot of people working on laptops. It's a bit pricey (4.25 for essentially a small cold brew) is the only reason it's not 5 stars. I'll still be back again!
If you are looking for great coffee and atmosphere, look no further.

Much needed place that serves beer  as well as coffee 
Comfortable place to hang out or end your busy work on Fridays to kickstart the weekend.

Start with a perfectly dialed cup of batch brew.

Finish with the Brown Sugar Rosemary seasonal latte.

Maybe a pastry--or two-- as well.
This what coffee needs to feel like. Well done!

I liked the style and the art, but it was very sterile. It didn't have any of those good cozy vibes I was hoping for. The chairs made a horrible sound on the floor that really effected the atmosphere.
Absolutely adorable. Food and bev delicious. Staff is very friendly. A gem
Great coffee, great food. Nice beer and wine selection. Employees seemed like they were having fun.

Last weekend I was in Charlotte for the wedding of one of my best friends from high school.

The morning after the wedding @sugga_mystery and I woke up early before our friends were awake and decided to hang out and stumbled upon @stablehandclt a little coffee shop close to downtown.

I'm almost embarrassed to say I'm not really much of a coffee person but this place has a pretty nice breakfast menu - particularly their strawberry basil stuffed biscuit.

Let's breakdown why:
1. The biscuit: this biscuit is buttery, soft and flakey all at the same time... that's the most you can ask from a biscuit
2. Frosting: this frosting was very sweet but somehow light, not overly thick, it pairs perfectly with the buttery biscuit
3. Strawberry and basil: you never really think of basil in a sweet biscuit but the two together taste fantastic... I wish I could have had two...

Everything was great. Very unique menu tried 3 items, all were great. I also tried a drip coffee, single origin espresso of the day, a draft latte, and an iced coffee. All were excellent! The draft latte was a bit too Milky and sweet for me but I was able to taste before ordering it, which was awesome! Ordered it anyway, no regrets. However, after all this caffeine my hands are far from steady

We just moved to the Charlotte area and have been trying the local coffee shops. Would love to give this place more stars but there were a few issues I had.

1. The cashier was a bit rude, not what I expect at a craft coffee shop
2. The hot oat latte we had may as well have been iced, it was the most Luke warm coffee I've ever had

Overall, it's great espresso, but that comes more down to the roaster than to anything else. Maybe they were having a bad day so I'll come again, but for now, 3 stars it is.

The place is just so bright and it brings good vibes 
Plus, the coffee tasted great. 
They deserve a 5 star for both the coffee quality and the amazing interior.
Very nice staff, solid filter coffee
Great coffee and amazing food offerings at decent prices. This place is super legit-- new favorite in Charlotte
Unadulterated awesomeness.

Delicious coffee. Impeccable latte art! The young lady was working the shift alone with a Cafe full of patrons. Despite the pressure, she handled everything so well and coffee flavor and art was spot on. Will definitely be back!
All of the employees here are beyond amazing! Very helpful and polite.
Unpretentious, great coffee, large drink selection, and good music. This is the best cafe in Charlotte, hands down.
Best coffee in Charlotte. Amazing food too

I think I may be addicted to Stablehand... in the best way possible. The coffee is so much better than other coffee shops. Their iced vanilla latte with oatmilk is the best and the staff are friendly and nice. The avocado toast is also the bomb. Go here, you won't regret it. Best coffeeshop.
Fantastic cafe to have in the neighborhood. Delicious coffee and staff is friendly and easy-going.
Phenomenal coffee.
Just noticed Goggle has the hours wrong. They're open til 7 Thursday, Friday, and Saturday
Rice porridge unique and tasty. Dirty chai was not too sweet and had a good balance of chai and espresso, which was great. Service was quick and friendly.
Savory porridge was delicious. My 8oz coffee and milk was amazing. Made for a perfect Sunday morning.
Incredible coffee! Love their banana and chocolate bread as well. I'd definitely recommend!
Recomiendo esta cafeteria a mi comunidad Latina, muy rico todo con buenos precios y servicios.
Good coffee and cool atmosphere. Coffee was ready quickly and tasted very good. Spacious indoors and with outside seating as well. Seems like a good place to chill.
Uptown vibe!!

It may be the location or the timing on opening but people haven't figured out how great this place is yet. I've been to over 20 coffee shops in Charlotte and this is in my top three. The food and drink have been made with a thoughtfulness and quality that really can't be compared to anywhere else in town. They even having evening food, alcohol and a gorgeous collection of bottles of wine, many of which are natural wines. Don't let the small size of the shop and menu scare you- everything is delicious. The savory rice porridge bowl may be my new favorite breakfast item in the city.
Beautiful Space. Excellent coffee. Good selection of natural wines. Larger and cosier than I thought it would be.  Was looking for a go to coffee place in the area and am glad to have found one.

My barista was a slender blonde with ink up her arms.  She had a passion for coffee and made just enough connection to make me feel welcome while still being time-efficient.  The coffee was brewed perfectly and the serving size was delightful.  I'm a "hot, black, and bitter" kinda guy, so I don't love a lot of liquid with my go-power.  Great vibe in the room, VERY busy, so that was a great sign, and the price point was A-OK.  All in all?  An excellent experience.  I look forward to getting my afternoon pick-me-up when I'm back in the neighborhood from Stable Hand.

What a beautiful and well put together place. The have an incredible wine selection and beer to match. I love coming here for some coffee and any of their breakfast options. The staff is always super friendly and knowledgeable. Try to stop by if they do a pop up dinner. Those have been unforgettable!

"Do you trust me?" Following a short exploratory conversation has to be my favorite thing to hear at a new place. I'm working in town a few months and I'll definitely be coming back to this place. Tasty coffee, delightful staff. Welcome to Charlotte~

Thanks for the wonderful cup of coffee and I appreciate the nice ambiance of this place.  I visited this coffee shop years ago and its nice to see its still around. Hex Coffee probably is the best roaster in Charlotte and I was impressed with the bag I bought at the shop and brought home.  Indeed, this place has great coffee, good beer selection and very interesting food menu.  I enjoyed sitting at a coffeeshop again after 3 months or so of not visiting one.  Hope Stable Hand (and Hex Coffee) will flourish and would encourage people to give this place a try and support this business.

Wonderful Vibe... Good food!
More avenues for me to come back explore.. Natural wines to endeavor in. Looking forward to sharing with my close friends and family.
Great coffee and good selection of brews. Fast and friendly staff.
my favorite coffee spot at the moment.

Super pleased to have a contemporary place like Stable Hand in Charlotte. Natural wine and small batch beer is really popular in NYC and LA, and SH offers both in a non pretentious way. Staff is super friendly.

Awesome wine, beer, coffee, tea, and food! I love the seasonal lattes because they are so unique. The bottled wine is a great deal to enjoy on the patio. Pick up some beers to go & snacks like the mini breakfast sandwiches are amazing!

I'm not a coffee shop afficianado, was invited to this one by a relative. It seemed very nice, coffee was good, service excellent, decor spare but pleasant. Prices reasonable in today's market. The outside tables and corral-style gossip rail a nice touch. Note opening hour has changed.
Excellent coffee. They serve Hex.
You can tell they really care about each cup of coffee by the way meticulously make it.
The only place I buy my Coffee Beans from.  And fantastic latte's
Not only is their coffee amazing but their food is too!  Highly recommend!
Extremely friendly staff. And great coffee and food! Recommend the sausage and veggie sando. Their cold brew is also legit.

Congrats to Hex and Good Bottle Company to join forces for Stable Hand: same great coffee prepared and offered by their kind team -- with hopefully more tasty food + drink options to follow soon.

Excited that one of our favorite CLT hangouts is open again and liking the new look. We won't be strangers.
Great coffee, friendly peeps
What is this? Horse-themed?
Pretty good internet connection
Adorable shop with amazing coffee, drinks, and food!
Great coffee, great vibes, great people.
They have some pretty solid internet

Hands down best Vanilla Latte I've ever had. I don't know what kind of vanilla they use, but it was amazing. I usually get 2% latte's as well and it was still amazing. Will def be back to get another soon.
A great blend of coffee shop, a casual spot to grab a beer/glass or bottle of wine. Casual cafe fare if you are wanting to grab a bite. A great spot for the neighborhood
